Geek &amp; Mild by Sean Sperte

The Aside is Dead, Long Live the Aside

Remember a few days ago when I said I’d be killing off the asides on Geek & Mild? I lied.

Actually, I didn’t lie. I just re-discovered their value (in my own words).

If you’d like to subscribe to just the posts without the asides, you can do that using this URL: http://seansperte.com/feed/posts.
